website_summaries.verdict: It's hard to find a better performer in this price range. It's simply the best deal for the money.
pros: Stands out from competitors with a powerful, 1,500-watt heating element and dependable stainless steel construction
cons: The wok primarily heats up on the bottom, making it hard to cook food on the sides of the pan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I always read the 1-star reviews first but in the case of this item I don’t understand the complaints. This wok heats precisely and quickly, yes it can burn if you’re cooking meat but using the right oil minimizes that, and the stainless steel is amazingly easy to clean with soap and water. If you haven’t got a gas stove to use a standard wok this is a perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: RCW

customer_reviews.title: Useless for wok cooking
customer_reviews.text: I am living in a rental with an ancient gas cooktop which has very poor heat. I purchased this electric wok hoping to do better. This wok heats up quite well but once food is put in the wok it falls flat with no return of temperature, ruining the dish. This product makes an excellent steamer but when used for wok cooking it is indeed useless. If you just want to fry things use a skillet and save your money.
customer_reviews.author: LarryH

customer_reviews.title: Is this normal????
customer_reviews.text: I gave this Wok to my son for Christmas. He cooked one (amazing) dish in it yesterday. It was heated with oil inside, used to cook our meal and later washed with soap and water. So disappointed that it has somehow turned. Is this normal?
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE

customer_reviews.title: Burns everything.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk that I just threw away. I am so disappointed with this product. I have only had since August (it is December when writing this). From the beginning, everything burned in it. Vegetables, noodles, rice... anything. Then today it burned my sausage gravy (Christmas breakfast) and yet wouldn't get hot enough to thicken it. The bottom gets too hot and burns right away (even when cooking on low heat).
customer_reviews.author: Wendy R. Selvig

customer_reviews.title: Best Electric Wok Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Received the wok today and could not wait to try it out! It heats to 400 degrees via the control unit and you can control the temperature to lower if you need it. Cooked everything perfectly and the clean up was so easy. Love that it is all lightweight stainless steel, so it's not too heavy - and that it has the aluminum core below the center on the outside of the stainless steel - it cooks so evenly and quickly. While it could benefit from having a wok rak on the lip for items that cook faster, it's the best electric wok I've found!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous wok!
customer_reviews.text: I've always heard that a stove top wok is the best. I have a glass top stove so that can't happen. I bought this particular electric because it has a stainless interior. It heats very quickly and gets hot enough too. I use it quite frequently, being a vegan. The photo is tonight's kung Pao soy curls.
customer_reviews.author: The Iconoclast

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for electric wok.
customer_reviews.text: Still need to cook a few more meals to season this, but if your gas stove has only medium and high settings (as ours does), or you need an extra burner for a dinner party, this is a handy device. If you've had an electric stainless wok before, there are no surprises here. Capacious interior, temp settings that correlate to actual wok temp, dial vivid enough that I can read it despite being blind in one eye. Glass lid is a major plus for things you want to simmer, like soups or slow-cook items. One of the most versatile tools in my kitchen, and great for frying things like tempura. Sure=footed steady base, too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pacher

customer_reviews.title: yuck
customer_reviews.text: I seasoned before..food stuck, tried everything...food sticks and burns ever time. I wanted a wok I could wash easier nope would give less than one star if could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heats very fast in the center of wok
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ever with a electric wok. It heated very fast in the center, too fast. Immediately burnt the tablespoon of butter, which maybe my fault, probably should have used oil. Turning it down only made the fried rice dish I was cooking turn out like simmered jambalaya. I'll have to try again. But, reluctant to waste precious time ruining a dish. Will check out videos before proceeding.
customer_reviews.author: KTB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight wok. I like that the temp control actually has degree settings as opposed to 1-10 number type settings. It’s very convenient to clean especially because it’s submersible. Of course it helps that I have a large sink. The bottom portion that heats the most discolored after using which will happen when subjected to high heat dry. Using the proper cleaning agent took care of that though (Bar Helpers Cleanser).
customer_reviews.author: G. Les Dawson

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to clean with steel wool
customer_reviews.text: I tried to "season" the stainless steel wok before using it for the first time. And my food still stuck. It was easy to clean with steel wool, but I had hoped it would not stick. So, I bought 3 more oils that can stand up to high heat, and re-seasoned it again using grapeseed oil. That seemed better but I still had to scrub to get it clean once again. I like the size/capacity of the wok as you can cook a lot of veggies. It really does a great job heating up quickly as other reviewers stated. I chose this one over a nonstick because I don't want to deal with one peeling over time.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Vance

customer_reviews.title: This might be the worst wok I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Everything burns, uneven heat distribution, the bottom gets caked black from everything that burns in it. Even after soaking it overnight this time, I couldn't get all of the black off. As I was scrubbing it, which I had to do every time I used it, and the stuff was still not budging in spots I finally cried uncle and threw it away. I didn't use it much to avoid dealing with the mess every time anyway. Waste of almost 70 dollars....
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great for Stir Fry
customer_reviews.text: Handles do not get hot while in use which is great. Wok is the perfect size for stir frying.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn E

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The sides are not slanted enough to move food items up and it burns easily. I wish I had never wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Leah B.

customer_reviews.title: Great wok
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wok. Heats up very quickly and makes great stir fry. To avoid boiling your food instead of frying it, add little amounts at a time and save your sauce till last. Turns out great every time. I love how easy it is to clean this thing. I followed the instructions and use stainless steel wool and quickly scour then throw it in the dishwasher... It will take up the whole dishwasher but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sacha

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: We just got this 5 days ago and we used it this morning twice already we love it,its a great wok, very light ,heat up right away and easy to clean. I wish they have it in a bigger size, we're family of 8. *I just wanna update this review after using this wok couple more times. The wok has a big "bronze" discoloration in the middle inside the wok it looks dirty and rusty...but it works really good.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this about 20 times and I mostly love it. Great value and functions well. Good - Heats up fast and holds heat well - Angle of sidewalls is great Bad - Sidewalls are not very thick and do not hold heat. All the heat happens at the baseplate bottom. - If you have any liquid spillage around the outside; the baseplate and legs are difficult to clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: We previously had a non stick coated wok, but unfortunately the coating had burnt spots that didn't clean up and in other places the non stick coating had come off. It was time for a new wok. We really like this stainless steel wok. I don't foresee that we will run into either of the problems that we had in our previous wok. This cooks very well and clean up is a breeze. Good purchase. If you are trying to decide on a stainless steel or a non-stick type, go stainless for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Just Us

customer_reviews.title: Everything sticks
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this because it was stainless. I have other stainless pans I love but this is awful. I have cooked stir fry in it 3 times. Everything sticks in it so bad. I let it soak overnight and still can't get the black char off the bottom. Now it has a permanent place in bottom cabinet. I will never use it again.
customer_reviews.author: MEel

customer_reviews.title: Box was damaged
customer_reviews.text: I don't really have a review, never used the product. It arrived in a damaged box and I returned it in the same box and have to tape it up. I ended up returning the product because it wouldn't fit on my counter top and couldn't find a place to plug it in to use it. I really thought it would have been usable on my kitchen counter...
customer_reviews.author: Raleeb

customer_reviews.title: Replaced old one / teflon with a stainless
customer_reviews.text: I saw a few reviews on this one before I bought it... I have owned Presto products before. Heats up real well... solid build... there is a slight sticking problem... but it is new and not seasoned. I liked the idea that it stainless instead of Teflon... due to the high temp cooking... It is can be submerged in water... no issue to clean. Just put some water in it ... heat and rub with a plastic flipper...
customer_reviews.author: David L. Greco

customer_reviews.title: Best Wok I have found so far!
customer_reviews.text: Great Electric Wok, This replaced on older red model for 40 years ago that the Teflon was peeling up on. This heats fast and cooks excellent with no Teflon to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas in Wa

customer_reviews.title: I really like it that the heat control is easy to see ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an elegant wok. It just exudes class. I really like it that the heat control is easy to see and read. (We had a different electric wok where this was not so and was a bit of an aggravation.) I am not as wild that the inside is not covered with Teflon or something like it. The vegetables stick to the side a bit. I also noticed that I used a bit more oil with this new wok.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sticks and blackens
customer_reviews.text: Not a non-stick surface at all. Terribly disappointed in the Amazon's Choice and seemingly highly recommended wok. Even with oil according to recipe, I have never had a time when what I was cooking didn't stick with the bottom of the wok over the heating element becoming immediately black with caked-on food even at a low temperature. Will unstick with wine or water. Water, at least, doesn't do much for the recipe. Presto, stick with pressure cookers or improve this appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Nature Lover

customer_reviews.title: No stick!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wok! Food cooks so quickly and so far, no problem with anything sticking. On top of that, it's super easy to clean. The manufacturer warns about the heat transference: it does heat quickly and gets hotter than I expected for the temperature set so now I know to use a lower heat than I usually would. So far, I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality &Fast
customer_reviews.text: This wok is very fast & you can whip up a stir fry in minutes. I wish it did have a non-stick surface (and yes, they do wear out over time, but then it is time for a new wok - they are not that expensive). I always seem to have a scorched area on the bottom of the wok, which is fairly easy to remove IF you immediately soak that area in hot, soapy water - don't let it dry out. Also, I found that it really cooks hot, at least 50 degrees hotter than what it says on the control, so I do not use the recommended temps in the manual & I have good results.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Really well made wok
customer_reviews.text: Very well built wok. Heavy lid and sturdy aluminum bowl; the temp was a bit hard for me to regulate but I'll give it another try - probably operator error! I made a chick/broccoli/mushrooms/ginger/garlic = yum!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: best ever
customer_reviews.text: bought another wok first, not good for my glass top stove..wanted an electric, bought one that couldn't ever get to 330 degrees..returned it, bought this one...omg, just made amazing fish and chips, yesterday, made fabulous stir fry..if you want an electric wok..this is the one !!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Just remember to clean your wok right away and you will have no problems.
customer_reviews.text: So far this wok has been a winner. I like cooking fresh fish on my boat . The wok got hot quickly and we browned the chilli pepper rock fish in a few minutes. So much fun . What a great price to .
customer_reviews.author: Grazia Pennisi

customer_reviews.title: No teflon to wear out
customer_reviews.text: As with other cookware made like this, the more you use it, the more seasoned it becomes - if you do it right. You end up with a non-stick surface on which you can use metal spatulas, cut items in the wok, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Evans

customer_reviews.title: Second time buying it
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use it for recipes that call for deep frying and when I need to make large amounts of veggies for parties etc. I purchased one over 5 years back and it was beginning to show some wear, so I got another one. I still use the pan from the old one bcoz it’s stainless steel and works great for me. The only con is the price, I wish it was 15-20$ lesser than the price they’re asking for it
customer_reviews.author: dealguy

customer_reviews.title: seems to burn on bottom
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I am doing something wrong, but the bottom of the wok always seems to burn and solidify the substances I am trying to cook at the bottom. Maybe I need to go back to a Teflon type material. I would not purchase this product again for this reason. I do want to point out however, if the inside bowl soaks for a while in hot soapy water, it is relatively easy to scrub clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Broccoletti

customer_reviews.title: is most like nearly as much as a new wok
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item in Sept, 2010. Today, one of the plastic legs disintegrated. Thought about trying to find a replacement leg, or even four, so as to be ready for additional failures. Instead, decided to just order a new one, as four new legs, plus shipping, is most like nearly as much as a new wok, with free shipping. Also decided to give five stars, as many purchases of similar type items have come and gone since 2010, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Returned after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: If you want to make fried rice, fried noodles or shaking beef, do not buy this wok. If you want to make something else, I wish you ...good luck with this STICK wok!
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: The Wok I've Been Looking  For
customer_reviews.text: I cook everything in this wok. It is perfect because I don't have to worry about using certain utensils when cooking in it. Some things do stick but a quick soak removes it. I'd much rather do that than be concerned with using a coated wok. It heats amazingly fast (like you'd better have your oil and food ready to go in as soon as you plug it in) fast. Easy to clean, too, since it can go in the dishwasher... It's not too heavy so I wash it by hand to save room in the dishwasher. I just don't want to be without this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Oustanding Quality Electric Wok!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this wok based upon our positive experiences with the Presto brand. The wok is stylish and is made of quality stainless steel. The plastic handles are cool touch and the rotary temperature controls respond quickly and seem to be accurate. For stir frying applications this is a excellent choice. You must remember to clean the unit afterwards.Stainless stell is durable and hygenic plus it looks great. The non-stick models have too many issues related to scratching, safety? etc. Highly recommended and a good value overall!
customer_reviews.author: eva & tom

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought years ago
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a Wok and the first use was a success as has every time after. Should have bought one years ago. It is quick and makes a very economical healthy meal. Billions of people use a wok just took me a long time to catch on why. Clean up is surprisingly easy. If something is stuck a non chlorine low abrasive powder and a plastic scrubber make quick work of it.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Cavazos

customer_reviews.title: Great product exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.text: This wok works great. Exactly as expected. It Heats up very quickly. When you cook the meat you will get paid a little bit of sticking from the proteins. This is the same with any stainless steel product. When you stir fry vegetables after or when you add your sauce that scrapes right off the bottom and adds flavor. Cleanup was easy. If needed add a little bar keepers friend and it will look brand-new again. I added a picture to show that nothing was stuck to the bottom after adding the veggies and the sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Tjam9

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Ive used woks for years and this is the first electric one. I highly recommend to save your money and DO not buy this product, the problem is the sides do not heat up only the bottom so as you cook the sides are so cold that it F's the whole dish up only the bottom is hot. A real wok the sides heat up also so everything cooks even.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Medium weight pan, quickly responsive to temperature setting, nice and stable- rubber on bottom of feet prevents sliding (unlike other presto products I own), easy to clean. Cons: Pan is somewhat shallow. The first time used the pan burned but food did not sear and brown up nicely- hoping as the pan gets seasoned this will change. Creates smoke and fine grease aerosol, will try peanut oil next time as it withstands higher temperatures without burning. Better for cooking small amounts of food at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Sorceress052

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wok! Set it at 325 degrees and once the oil starts to smoke I cook my meal in 5 mins or less. Easy clean up and its on my kitchen counter 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: Ann D.

customer_reviews.title: Superior results
customer_reviews.text: I have begun to stir fry more meals for both convenience and taste, but trying to use frying pans or pots were both inconvenient and disappointing as to taste and inconsistent results. This Presto electric wok is fantastic. Very well made, cooks quickly and evenly and can be cleaned in the dishwasher. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: William A.

customer_reviews.title: A Versatile Wok
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for Eating Hot Pot or Da Beino, Chinese family gathering and eating together. This wok works great for that purpose. And can plain cook if needed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Iteam
customer_reviews.text: Whatever you do don’t buy this one is not worth your money and you would waste good by burning it ir does not matter if you follow directions when is bad is bad
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Large Wok - Screaming H O T !!!
customer_reviews.text: Large wok with plenty of room to stir fry a full quart of good without steaming in. the temperature gauge is very sensitive and gets so hot I have been unable to use the hottest setting. No cold spots. easy to clean - I threw water in the hot wok and it steamed off all of the baked on pieces and then I rinsed it in the sink - it took 25 seconds to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Sipe

customer_reviews.title: This Wok is Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have never cooked with a wok before, but I have found that cooking with this wok is amazing. The process is so simple and it is very easy to see what you are doing and make adjustments accordingly. It is very important to have everything cut up and ready to go when you turn it on since things go very fast. I have never had more healthy meals, and never has cooking been so satisfying and fun. I am not talking gourmet meals here; I prepare peasant stuff but it is great. The wok is very easy to clean up afterward, no different than an ordinary stainless steel frying pan.
customer_reviews.author: Ken MacIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great wok! I bought this a few months ago and use it on a regular basis. Some of the reviews have complained about the steel turning brown...it's from not cleaning it. After you're done cooking, add water to the wok, heat it up and scrape the wok before washing it. That should get rid of all of the brown! I was disappointed that it had a flat bottom and still don't like it AS much as a round bottom, but it still works very well. Great for cooking chicken and whatnot very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Wieland

customer_reviews.title: Wok
customer_reviews.text: Large electric wok. Wish the power cord was about 3 feet longer. Works good for stir frying. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Bullwinkle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful wok works weally well
customer_reviews.text: This wok works well The element is circular around the periphery of the flat bottom. It provides enough heat, electrically, to do a decent job like a real steel wok. It is stable on the counter top and the clear glass cover is perfect for it. What would work better? An iron or heavy steel wok on a gas stove or charcoal fire; If you are like me and cannot do it that way, then this wok is for you. Downside: if you don't need a wok very often, try to get by with a frypan on the stove. This thing is big, takes up space on counter and in storage.
customer_reviews.author: Francis P. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I just received this wok and I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I just received this wok and I love this product! I was going to buy an electric griddle but did not want to cook with teflon. I can see that the wok will clean easily and the food tasted great. I don't even know what I'm doing yet (!) but put some fish in there and then cooked broccoli with pineapple and added some teriyaki sauce. Fabulous! I can't wait to try some others recipes and I don't really like to cook!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: n-i-c-e
customer_reviews.text: I had a faberware stainless steel wok for years, literally wore the thing out and they don't make them anymore. I bought another brand, with good ratings, it was good for about a month. It would turn on, but barely heat up, tossed it. We shall see if this one has lasting power. It shipped FAST, even during holiday, so kudo's to Wayfair! for being able to get something out quickly. I like the design, it is easy to stir fry in, and does tempura nicely as well.
customer_reviews.author: rocky mt lady

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure this works well for someone who knows what ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this works well for someone who knows what they're doing. I managed to stain it first time out, probably got it too hot. Have used a few times, but haven't mastered wok cooking by any means, usually end up with more of a sautéed result.
customer_reviews.author: LoveAnimalsAZ

customer_reviews.title: Good Wok...
customer_reviews.text: So far, it works fairly well. If I had a "real" complaint, it would be that it runs a bit on the hot side, but adjusted temps over time to compensate.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk6

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, stable and well made
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, stable and well made. Easy to clean. I like it much better than my old stove top woks, much easier to maintain the temp you're after. And with the extra stability the legs provide, its easier to use for other "non-wok" type dishes that may get top heavy in a wok. Plus it frees up a spot on my stove top.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. RM

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my 38 year old Farberware electric wok. This ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my 38 year old Farberware electric wok. This heats fast and cooked my stir fry perfectly. However, the cord does have a bit of an issue staying in.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I’d prefer if sides heated evenly with bottom. Need high heat all around for good crunchy stir fry.
customer_reviews.author: Radiant Palms

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is, hands-down, the best wok I’ve ever used! Its quick power up, whole-surface heating ability, obvious durability, and vented glass lid make preparing one-dish Asian meals a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Had a teflon one for years. This was a perfect replacement I love it. Cleans easily with Barkeepers when you cook too high. Great Wok.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth beyer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use, Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: The temperature is hard to keep regulated, either too cool or wants to burn. It is hard to clean and stains easily. I'll be buying another model soon.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsywych

customer_reviews.title: wok cooking made easy
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good, I was very pleased with the overall looks of this wok. I used it for the first time a little worried about sticking and clean up, (my last wok was a non stick surface)This wok was wonderful! I was able to make a nice meal quickly and clean up was easy as well. I have made stir fry, sloppy joe's, soup and also hot apple cider. I love the fact that there is no non stick surface to worry about I would recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it cooks about like my electric fry pan does at 250 to 300 ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a little challenge to clean but it works OK. I don't think mine gets as hot as it says it is supposed to. When it says it's at top temperature, it cooks about like my electric fry pan does at 250 to 300 degrees. ( It's supposed to be somewhere near 450 or 500 according to the dial.) Still hot enough to get things cooked so I'm OK with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Kaberle

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy cooking with a wok and this products is excellent. People having a bad experience must not know how to and what to, properly cook in a wok. Easy to clean. Made in USA and that is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald R. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Love the wok.
customer_reviews.text: We just started stir frying and so far so good. Easy to clean, heats up nice, lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Olby

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Wok
customer_reviews.text: Love this wok. Heats very quickly and is a joy to cook with. If not for all the prep work, you could cook dinner in a matter of minutes. Add thick or sweet sauces toward the end of the cooking process or they stick to the main heating area and really slow down the heating. I have large hands and manage to operate the controls without burning myself as others have complained about.
customer_reviews.author: M. Paulsen

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: works really well. We were worried about it being electric but it does a really good job. Season like cast iron rather than washing with soap.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than other companies
customer_reviews.text: On a scale of one to ten, i give this a ten. Bought this for my granddaughter one wee ago. She loves it. It's the greatest
customer_reviews.author: Marie mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: STAINLESS STEEL WOK IS THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I recently replaced all my teflon cookware with stainless steel. This electric wok is the center of my kitchen. I use it every day to cook all my vegetables. It has numerous heat settings, although I've not used the highest. It can be washed in the dishwasher, but I use Bar Keeper's Friend. It is faster to clean than the wok I originally had made of teflon. - F. Parker
customer_reviews.author: Brookview Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It is more than what we had expected. It heats up quickly and maintains the heat at various settings very well. The only thing that we find on the con side is that the glass lid is a bit heavier than what we would like. Overall, we are very happy with this work so far, grant it that we have only used it five times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: Heats up very quick. Can scrub with no worry of chipping the non stick coating because there is none. Great wok and would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F

customer_reviews.title: Awesome For Frying
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the sole purpose of deep frying fish, chicken, fries, etc. It is awesome! Heats up so quick it's hard to believe and holds the temperature amazingly well. No noticeable temperature drop when placing food in the hot oil. It doesn't take a lot of oil and fries everything to perfection. Best of all, it's SO easy to clean. If you like to fry, this is a game-changer. I use it outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: angelo russo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Big size perfect for anything you want to cook. I like the stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Shiny

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This wok looks so beautiful in person...I used it all the time. It isn't non-stick but with a little elbow grease everything comes off and it looks just like new again.
customer_reviews.author: nativecalgal

customer_reviews.title: Large Wok!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wok.I used it a lot since i love making stir fry. Cleans well and heat fast. I used it a lot for outside since i don't the smell of garlic inside my house. You can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: This wok heats fast and does the job it’s meant for. I wish it was a bit heavier, but for the price it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wok. I don't use oil so when I use broth I heat the pan then SLOWLY add the broth as not to get scalded. I don't use the lid except for storage. A great find! We are vegan and I like crisp vegis so this is great for that. I will bring this camping and traveling with us. It is a good size wok so be sure you have the room to store it.
customer_reviews.author: mysticalrising

customer_reviews.title: ... MANY electric woks this is the first one I've loved!!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased MANY electric woks this is the first one I've loved!!
customer_reviews.author: peggy hamann

customer_reviews.title: Works as if it were on gas stove
customer_reviews.text: The size is bigger than most electric woks which is exactly what I wanted. Cooks up just right.
customer_reviews.author: Jo A.

customer_reviews.title: Hardly Got Hot--Sooo Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wok based on Amazon reviews that this wok would get hot. Perhaps mine was broken, but the heat was only as high as a skillet on the stove with a low-medium flame.
customer_reviews.author: Pam NYC

customer_reviews.title: I like to have smaller mouth version for family soup
customer_reviews.text: I like it because of it's stainless body with no harmful flakes. I bought it for making soup. I don't make fried food much. I wish Presto makes little bit narrower mouth and just little but height version for 4 family soup maker. I have blue plastic one but...can not clean in the dishwasher and it is too small. One more time....I love stainless cooking pot!
customer_reviews.author: NJM

customer_reviews.title: Good wok
customer_reviews.text: Heats up fast and stays on temp. Would be great if it could heat a little hotter but it does the job. I purchased it mainly to be able to cook smelly fish outside and it's perfect for that. It does have a pretty short plug in cord. Would be nice to have a couple more feet of length.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and purchase another wok.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product 7 months ago and used it approximately a dozen times. The unit is now failing to heat and keep a consistent temperature so I am tossing the wok. Save your money and purchase another product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim D.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. The element is only on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. The element is only on the bottom, so if you turn it up too high your food will scorch to the bottom. Gets hot enough you use as a countertop fryer also. I use it to make fritters and other small things when I'm too lazy to break out the outdoor fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: just as easy to clean as my stainless steel calphalon pots and ...
customer_reviews.text: Heats up fast, just as easy to clean as my stainless steel calphalon pots and pans. As long as you don't overheat your wok you shouldn't end up with a mess. I like to use barkeeper's friend on it to keep it nice and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Owen

customer_reviews.title: after only two uses the dial on the temperature is not turning easily. The dial is too close to the hot ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything sticks to the bottom even when using extra oil. Also, after only two uses the dial on the temperature is not turning easily. The dial is too close to the hot pan.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Crawford

customer_reviews.title: more than a donut fryer
customer_reviews.text: yes, I bought this because I wanted the surface area and temperature control for making donuts. Years ago, I used my westbend wok for this, but have worn out two. Been looking for a good wok for several years.Because of good reviews, decent price and satisfaction with my Presto pressure cooker, I bought this to use for holiday guests. WOW. Donuts were perfect and clean up easy. Then I made stir fry two nights (following included directions) Again, some of the best cooking raves I've ever gotten and simple to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Cooks Quickly, Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wash, heats up and cooks quickly, is a great size. A very convenient choice if you are looking for a good wok
customer_reviews.author: Asa

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got the SS pan
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got the SS pan !! Works GREAT and Keep's from splattering all over, Hot and Fast Responsive !!!! Easy Clean Up !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Schmittle

customer_reviews.title: Very good electric Wok
customer_reviews.text: Works as I thought it would. Heats quickly, does what it is supposed to do. Gleans very easily, even food that looks like it is stuck on bottom. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Denis D. Charpentier

customer_reviews.title: ... I can say it heats up fast & is easy to use & clean up
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it 3 times so far & I can say it heats up fast & is easy to use & clean up.
customer_reviews.author: L. L. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful wok
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it at college and absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: jae

customer_reviews.title: Just like taking a Wok
customer_reviews.text: I have had an awesome wok almost very evening from the day I received it. I almost cook everything in it. It is a great size. I have even made re fried beans, fried rice and of course what it was made for "stir fry". Stir fry with a can of tuna (do not drain) was an experiment and it came out awesome. I am thinking of buying another one for a back up or a large gathering for dinner...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W Harper

customer_reviews.title: What a great wok!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a teflon coated wok. I used it for years and thought I loved it. Then it broke and I switched to stainless because I don't really like the whole Teflon thing. WOW! I wish I would have done it years ago. It is so easy to clean. I don't put it in the dishwasher but because it's totally submersible it cleans up in a whiz. I hope I never Have to get another wok again. It cooks really well too. It gets very hot and cooks quickly. If you use frozen stir -fry veggies let them get room temp first or it cools it down too much.
customer_reviews.author: supercook

customer_reviews.title: the best electric wok on the market
customer_reviews.text: i am chinese and have used many brands of electric woks, this one is by far the best i have ever used. heats up quickly and gets very hot, something that most all other electric woks will not do. i have had woks that i could not even deep fry with. the stainless steel conducts heat much better than non stick. the handles do feel a little flimsy with a full load but after using it hard for over a year no problems yet. high reccomendation from an asian.
customer_reviews.author: 97guns

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Cooks stirfry really fast
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Cooks stirfry really fast. Its easy to clean and perfect for summer when you don't want to heat the kitchen up
customer_reviews.author: Genesis

customer_reviews.title: I like this Wok!
customer_reviews.text: Great Wok for the money. Takes very little time to heat up and is quite large (which is good for my big family). Cleans up pretty easily. It would be nice if the temp dial stuck out farther from the hot Wok though (not much room to work with and the dial get's quite hot)!
customer_reviews.author: Roger  Texas

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and hot
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a few non stick woks over the years and going stainless steel was a good choice. You can use any utensil in there, scrub out the bottom of the pan, crank up the heat as high as you want, and toss it in the dish washer. All without having to worry about chipping a non stick surface or accidentally eating some of the paint chips in every meal. Fair warning though, you will need a lot more oil than you are used to. And you'll have to keep stirring more often.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Betzen

customer_reviews.title: ... brought one of these for my mom and she loved it so much that I had to buy one ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally brought one of these for my mom and she loved it so much that I had to buy one for myself! Does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my mother and she absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: I love this wok
customer_reviews.text: For years I have used a small stove top wok and was frustrated by the heat being unbalanced and my recipes not turning out very well. I love this wok! The large size, the heating element and it is so easy to clean as well. We have made many delicious meals in this wok...no longer frustrated. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Super Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this WOK it was 1/2 the price of the higher rated one, but works great. It heats up fast, cleans well and well made. I was sort of in the middle of all the WOKS I looked for price and turned out to be the best choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: Always Buying Something

product_meta.title: Presto 5900 1500-Watt Stainless-Steel Electric Wok
product_meta.description: The quick and easy way to prepare sizzling stir-fry meals. Healthy stir-fry cooking sears ingredients in just a small amount of oil to preserve nutrients as well as fresh colors, flavors, and textures. 120 volts, 60 Hz only. It should not be used with an adapter.
feature_bullets: Easy-to-use electric wok with a durable stainless-steel body
1500W heating element; aluminum-clad base for fast, even heating
Side loop handles; tempered-glass cover with stainless-steel rim & handle
Long-handled wooden spatula included; dishwasher-safe wok & lid

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,004 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
